catalog_info.title: Reproductive Ecology
catalog_info.notes: This course counts towards the Anatomy/Physiology subfield requirement in HEB. Mandatory weekly discussion section.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Life Sciences 2 or Human Evolutionary Biology 1310 required.
catalog_info.description: A course on the physiology, ecology and evolutionary biology of human and primate reproduction. Topics covered include gamete production, gestation, birth, lactation, reproductive maturation, mature reproductive function, aging and senescence.
